courses.title: Quran Basics
courses.description: Gain a solid foundation in Quranic reading with this comprehensive course designed for beginners. Learn essential skills to confidently begin your journey with the Quran.

courses.title: Tajweed Essentials
courses.description: Master the core principles of Tajweed to enhance your Quranic recitation. This course focuses on the proper articulation and pronunciation of Quranic verses.

courses.title: Hifz Program
courses.description: Begin your memorization journey with our structured Hifz program, tailored to guide you step-by-step in committing the Quran to memory.

courses.title: Recitation Mastery
courses.description: Achieve fluency and eloquence in Quranic recitation with advanced techniques and personalized feedback. Perfect your recitation for both personal practice and public recitations.

courses.title: Kids Tajweed
courses.description: An engaging and easy-to-follow Tajweed course for children. This course introduces young learners to the correct recitation of the Quran in a fun and interactive way.

courses.title: Quranic Arabic
courses.description: Unlock the language of the Quran by learning essential Arabic grammar and vocabulary. This course helps you understand the deeper meanings of the Quranic text.

courses.title: Tafseer Essentials
courses.description: Deepen your understanding of the Quran with an introductory course on Tafseer, exploring the historical, linguistic, and contextual meanings of Quranic verses.

courses.title: Advanced Tajweed
courses.description: Refine your recitation with advanced Tajweed rules. This course focuses on perfecting pronunciation and fluency for a more precise and beautiful Quranic recitation.

courses.title: Quranic Duas
courses.description: Memorize and understand key supplications (Duas) from the Quran that can be used in daily life. This course provides spiritual insight and practical applications for each Dua.

courses.title: Quranic Tafseer for Kids
courses.description: Introduce your child to the meaning and beauty of Quranic verses. This kid-friendly Tafseer course is designed to make learning fun and engaging for young learners.
